statements: DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = 'sender123' AND receiver_address = 'receiver456';
DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = 'sender@example.com' AND receiver_address = 'receiver@example.com';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM blocks WHERE block_id IN (SELECT block_id FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice')
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM blocks WHERE previous_block_hash = '123456')
DELETE FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = 1 AND transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = 1 AND transaction_id = '1a3ea2b7-389b-4bfa-9d70-c4d67b18c0fd';
DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = '123 Main Street' AND receiver_address = '456 Elm Street';
DELETE FROM block_details WHERE transaction_count < 10 AND timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
DELETE FROM asset_details WHERE owner_address = '0x123abc' OR total_supply = 0;
DELETE FROM holders WHERE holder_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE balance = 0 AND transactions_count = 0
